pkgmetadata.longdescription: Profiling Compliers and Non-Compliers for Instrumental Variable Analysis // Estimating the mean and variance of a covariate for the complier, never-taker and always-taker subpopulation in the context of instrumental variable estimation. This package implements the method described in Marbach and Hangartner (2019) doi:10.2139/ssrn.3380247.
